## Source: ossf-package-analysis (72d7f8fc3a75036a65efb8bfa775e288fca63ae4201506ac9f8505fee566413d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'macaqua' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
